From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


Film by Stefon Bristol


This article needs a plot summary. Please add one in your own words. (March 2024) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)

CountryUnited StatesLanguageEnglish
Breathe is an upcoming American science fiction action thriller film directed by Stefon Bristol, written by Doug Simon, and starring Jennifer Hudson, Milla Jovovich, Quvenzhané Wallis, Common, and Sam Worthington. The film is set in a world where oxygen levels on Earth have dropped making it impossible to live on the planet's surface without specialised equipment.


Cast[edit]
Jennifer Hudson as Maya
Milla Jovovich as Tess
Quvenzhané Wallis as Zora
Common as Darius
Sam Worthington as Lucas
Raúl Castillo as Micah
Dan Martin as Mike
Production[edit]
In December 2019, Doug Simon's screenplay Breathe was revealed to be on that year's "Black List" of the most-liked unproduced screenplays in Hollywood.[1] In May 2022, it was announced that Sam Worthington, Jennifer Hudson, Milla Jovovich, Quvenzhané Wallis and Common were set to star in the film, to be directed by Stefon Bristol.[2]
Filming took place on location in Pennsylvania during late 2022.[3]

Release[edit]
Breathe is scheduled to be released in limited theaters, VOD and digital formats on April 26, 2024.[4]

^ Smart, Jack. "Jennifer Hudson and Quvenzhané Wallis Fend Off Disaster in Post-Apocalyptic Breathe Trailer (Exclusive)". People. Retrieved March 13, 2024.
